price: 9. „Mūsa (Moze), iš tiesų, tai esu Aš, Allahas, Visa Galingas, Visa Išmintingas.
arabic: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāmūsā innahu anā al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
